Html:
Hi,

I cannot found a package for Prism 4.2 for .NET 4.5.1. Is a release planned for the NuGet package?

Hi,

Right now there is no NuGet package published for Prism 4.2, but as far as I know the team is planning to publish one in the near future.
For now the updates are being released in the form of drops so that the community can provide their feedback or report any errors before publishing the new version in NuGet.

Thanks,

Damian Cherubini
http://blogs.southworks.net/dcherubini
